innobit_Expansion.LED_setPixelColor3: Set the colors of three pixes
innobit_Expansion.LED_setPixelColor32:
Set the colors of three pixels 

from RGB values
innobit_Expansion.MP_Servo.maxAngle: Get the maximum angle for the servo
innobit_Expansion.MP_Servo.minAngle: Get the minimum angle for the servo
innobit_Expansion.colors: Getsthe RGB value of a known color
innobit_Expansion.motor_M1:
Initialize the speed of motor M1
 (-255 to 255)
innobit_Expansion.motor_M2:
Initialize the speed of motor M2
 (0 to 255)
innobit_Expansion.readData: Initialize DHT11 sensor to get temperature and humidity
innobit_Expansion.readhumidity: Get the humidity from DHT11 sensor
innobit_Expansion.readtemperature: Get the temperature from DHT11 sensor
